issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: Signifies completion of tasks, info requests, etc.
resolution.name: Completed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Some fields have been removed from the tables associated with put_metric_data (specifically the metric_data table, the custom_metric_data_X tables, and the system_metric_data_X tables in the eucalyptus_cloudwatch_backend tables)

The fields that have been removed are all the fields in the AbstractPersistentWithDimensions class and its super-classes.  (id was re-added afterwards).

Upgrade needs to remove these fields from these tables.
fields.summary: certain fields in cloudwatch metric_data tables need to be removed for upgrade

comments.body:
git show cb69ecdf2883b022cad7e277ed44c0c1209b9769
git branch dev-ethomas-EUCA-11421-merge

Fix verified.

Prior to upgrade:


{code:java}
[root@d-23 ~]# psql -p 8777 -h /var/lib/eucalyptus/db/data eucalyptus_shared

eucalyptus_shared=# select column_name, data_type, character_maximum_length
eucalyptus_shared-# from INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS where table_name = 'metric_data';
      column_name      |          data_type          | character_maximum_length 
-----------------------+-----------------------------+--------------------------
 id                    | character varying           |                      255
 creation_timestamp    | timestamp without time zone |                         
 last_update_timestamp | timestamp without time zone |                         
 metadata_perm_uuid    | character varying           |                      255
 version               | integer                     |                         
 dim_10_name           | character varying           |                      255
 dim_10_value          | character varying           |                      255
 dim_1_name            | character varying           |                      255
 dim_1_value           | character varying           |                      255
 dim_2_name            | character varying           |                      255
 dim_2_value           | character varying           |                      255
 dim_3_name            | character varying           |                      255
 dim_3_value           | character varying           |                      255
 dim_4_name            | character varying           |                      255
 dim_4_value           | character varying           |                      255
 dim_5_name            | character varying           |                      255
 dim_5_value           | character varying           |                      255
 dim_6_name            | character varying           |                      255
 dim_6_value           | character varying           |                      255
 dim_7_name            | character varying           |                      255
 dim_7_value           | character varying           |                      255
 dim_8_name            | character varying           |                      255
 dim_8_value           | character varying           |                      255
 dim_9_name            | character varying           |                      255
 dim_9_value           | character varying           |                      255
 account_id            | character varying           |                      255
 dimension_hash        | character varying           |                      255
 metric_name           | character varying           |                      255
 metric_type           | character varying           |                      255
 namespace             | character varying           |                      255
 sample_max            | double precision            |                         
 sample_min            | double precision            |                         
 sample_size           | double precision            |                         
 sample_sum            | double precision            |                         
 timestamp             | timestamp without time zone |                         
 units                 | character varying           |                      255
(36 rows)
{code}

After upgrade:


{code:java}
[root@d-23 ~]# psql -p 8777 -h /var/lib/eucalyptus/db/data eucalyptus_shared
psql (9.2.8)
Type "help" for help.

eucalyptus_shared=# select column_name, data_type, character_maximum_length
eucalyptus_shared-# from INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS where table_name = 'metric_data';
  column_name   |          data_type          | character_maximum_length 
----------------+-----------------------------+--------------------------
 id             | character varying           |                      255
 account_id     | character varying           |                      255
 dimension_hash | character varying           |                      255
 metric_name    | character varying           |                      255
 metric_type    | character varying           |                      255
 namespace      | character varying           |                      255
 sample_max     | double precision            |                         
 sample_min     | double precision            |                         
 sample_size    | double precision            |                         
 sample_sum     | double precision            |                         
 timestamp      | timestamp without time zone |                         
 units          | character varying           |                      255
(12 rows)
{code}
